StoredQueryDescription.Title: GetFeatureById
StoredQueryDescription.Abstract: Returns the single feature whose value is equal to the specified value of the ID argument

StoredQueryDescription.Title: GetFeatureByType
StoredQueryDescription.Abstract: Returns a collection of features by type. If returnFeatureTypes='gml:AbstractFeatureType', the query applies to any supported feature type.
